text: وَجَحَدُواْ بِهَا وَٱسۡتَيۡقَنَتۡهَآ أَنفُسُهُمۡ ظُلۡمٗا وَعُلُوّٗاۚ فَٱنظُرۡ كَيۡفَ كَانَ عَٰقِبَةُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدِينَ

translation.en: And they rejected them, while their [inner] selves were convinced thereof, out of injustice and haughtiness. So see how was the end of the corrupters
translation.id: Dan mereka mengingkarinya karena kezaliman dan kesombongannya, padahal hati mereka meyakini (kebenaran)nya. Maka perhatikanlah bagaimana kesudahan orang-orang yang berbuat kerusakan
